attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The number in Recruits to the armed forces are at a record low .Youth crime is on the rise with senseless yobs causing havoc to the British people ,this is a key way to reducing youth crime to a record low if the government send all 16 to 25 year olds to do a two year minimum service to the british armed forces.The levels of discipline in the armed forces are adequate to teach younger people to be respectable to all walks of life and everyone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
